main_features: Breathable mesh back with contoured lumbar support for all-day comfort
Pneumatic seat height adjustment and simple tilt with lock — tool-free basic adjustments
Durable powder-coated steel frame with nylon 5-star base and smooth-rolling casters

technical_specs.seat_dimensions: Seat width 48 cm (19 in) x Seat depth 44 cm (17.5 in)
technical_specs.frame_material: Powder-coated steel frame with nylon 5-star base
technical_specs.upholstery: Breathable polyester mesh back; molded polyurethane foam padded seat with polyester fabric cover
